availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert D. Hopper (Morgan County, OH, attorney )

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, attorney. Ohio native. Son of James Hopper and Margaret Hopper. Married to Mary Hopper. Father of Erwin T. Hopper and James Hopper. Student in Morgan County, Ohio, in 1850. Attorney in McConnelsville in 1860. Prosecuting attorney for the Morgan County Court of Common Pleas in McConnelsville in 1861. Attorney in Morgan County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Olive, p. 254A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, McConnelsville, p. 301.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Morgan County, OH, June 1863, p. 4.
KYR-0001-022-0008.
